page.title: 03WEST WITTERING VILLAGE
page.content: West Wittering was formerly a fishing village but has now developed into a small high-clas residential and holiday resort. Now lying inland are the old coastguard cottages which show how the sea has been pushed back over the years.The remainder of West Wittering village comprises of a few old cottages near the church and numerous attractive private estates and luxury homes,some of which are holiday homes. Amongst the famous people who have lived in the village are Eric Gill,the sculptor,whose father was vicar here from 1914 _ 1930,and Sir Henry Royce, who lived and worked here from 1917 until his death here in April 1933.
